02 Sep 2011

Barry’s Face Makes it to Press Ready Artwork!

By in category

Check out what was embedded in my email from Beau’s Jordan Bamforth. It’s a real life mock-up ( think that’s an oxymoron) of our Hypenotic mascot in the pose selected by you, our faithful readers way back in May.

The good news is that Beaus has put a significant enough dent in their palatte of caps to get the press ready artwork ready to produce the next batch. Here’s a preview of the magic behind the cap.

You’re still about 6-8 weeks away from being able to purchase one of the 100,000 Barry Brew Beaus Beers at your local LCBO.  But if you’re looking for your fix of Beaus before that, I suggest you head to Beaus’ Oktoberfest from September 30th to October 2nd. Obviously ones for creative thinking, Beau’s events will include

  • Keg toss
  • Spouse carrying race (we’re in training for that one)
  • 100 pounds of playdough and Doo-Doo the clown for the kiddies
We’ll keep you posted on the beer caps and some fun opportunities to get involved once they’re on store shelves.
About us

Hypenotic is a marketing strategy, design & development firm that chooses to use its powers for good. We’re a certified founding member of B Corp in Canada. Since ’98, we’ve helped a lot of interesting people do important things. We create relevant communications and useful experiences. Find out more.
